title: Plamo Tsukurou
description:
<a href="http://sl-blag.blogspot.com/2007/11/gunpla-tutorial-videos.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://sl-blag.blogspot.com/2007/11/gunpla-tutorial-videos.html</a>

Here are youtube links to the Japanese model making TV show Plamo Tsukurou.
If you want those episodes in better quality and/or want to spend some money, buy the DVDs!
CDjapan and Amazon.co.jp have them for sale thou amazons checkout process is completely in Japanese while cdjapan in in English.
